title: WhatsApp to finally support latest iOS 15  features with new update
content:
It’s been six months since Apple released iOS 15, and only now WhatsApp is bringing full support for the iPhone’s latest operating system. According to WABetaInfo, version 22.7.0.76 of WhatsApp beta finally brings support to iOS 15.

more…

The post WhatsApp to finally support latest iOS 15 features with new update appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: It's been six months since Apple released iOS 15, and only now WhatsApp is bringing full support for the iPhone's latest operating system.
